title: Thoughts on the new Lee teaser?

embed.description: "Immortal sight cannot be obscured." Mirror of: https://twitter.com/LeagueOfLegends/status/843884763450494976 https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/videos/10158638041890556/

body: There is some speculation that it might be a joke for April fools. I'm going to be pissed if it is, I'm beyond hyped.
